Defs: WM Smarter food selection Smarter_Food_Selection https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=30708.0 newest WMSFS_2_3_0_2 2.3.0.2 Survival Foods Rework| Changed how Pemmican and Packaged Survival Meals were categorized:| -They now have their own category "MealSurvival" -They should now be consumed after more perishable meal options (including nutrient paste) -Colonists will still pick them up into their inventory in-line with vanilla behavior, but they will choose other options come meal time if available -Pets should now mostly ignore them opting for raw foods first| Bug Fix:| -Rescued Space Refugees / Wild Men were not being asigned a policy and would be fed corpses or not at all. They now default to "Friendly" policy -Fixed compatability with RimFridge. Colonists will now use wall fridges. WMSFS_2_3_0_1 2.3.0.1 Herbivore animals bug fix| Fixed herbivore animals never eating grass.| Enjoy ! WMSFS_2_3 2.3 B19 update| Smarter Food Selection now for B19.| Please note that this mod is unmaintained and that this is a minimum update for B19.| The mod might be unstable. WMSFS_2_1_1 2.1.1 Hotfix| Compatibility| * Zombieland by Pardekei. * All Star Wars mods by Jecrell. * Perhaps more mods...| Misc| * General compatibility enhancement. * Enhanced conflicts messages. WMSFS_2_1 2.1.0 Updated to A17| Minor changes| * Forcing paste dispense will now show a message if available energy is insufficient. WMSFS_2_0_a_hotfix_4 2.0.14 Hotfix| UI Change| * New inspect tab. UI is no more shown inside the needs tab.| Bugs fixes| * Error messages (yellow) after selling stuff to traders.| * Pets still hunting prisoners (oops). * Pets will not hunt humans at all anymore (even hostile ones). WMSFS_2_0_a_hotfix_3 2.0.13 Hotfix|Fixed bug with colonists and visitors not eating their food in inventory\nVisitors won't steal your food anymore !|Can now make visitors use their vanilla behavior in settings.|Fixed insects affected by a food policy and trying to fetch other foods than their jelly.|Added scheduled food search cache clearing. This might improve performances a bit.
